messages.content: ComfyUI-Champ is a custom node or plugin for ComfyUI that allows users to utilize the pretrained models and checkpoints from the CHAMP project to generate images and videos.
Which pretrained models need to be downloaded for ComfyUI-Champ?
To use ComfyUI-Champ, you need to download the pretrained weights for StableDiffusion V1.5, sd-vae-ft-mse, and image_encoder models.
Where can the CHAMP checkpoints be downloaded from?
The CHAMP checkpoints can be downloaded from the provided Google Drive link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1hZiOHG-qDf0Pj7tvfxC70JQ6wHUvUDoY
How should the paths for the downloaded pretrained models and checkpoints be set in ComfyUI-Champ?
The paths for the downloaded pretrained models and checkpoints should be set in the ChampLoader node in ComfyUI-Champ.
Where can examples of ComfyUI-Champ workflows be found?
Examples of ComfyUI-Champ workflows can be found in the provided links: https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-Champ/blob/main/wf.mp4 and https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-Champ/blob/main/wf.json
Is there a specific location where the pretrained models need to be placed?
No, the pretrained models can be placed in any path as the nodes in ComfyUI-Champ can set absolute paths.
What is the GitHub repository for the CHAMP project?
The GitHub repository for the CHAMP project is https://github.com/fudan-generative-vision/champ
